channel.title: Which is the best way to use one cycle waveforms as oscillators on a patch?
channel.description:
Hi, I've already made a lot of subtractive synths and patches in the axoloti and now I'm looking into using it as a sampler followed by a synth like architecture and to use one cycle waveforms as oscillators in a patch.
Which modules would you recommend?

item.title: Which is the best way to use one cycle waveforms as oscillators on a patch?
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

@gufz

Try doing a search on "one cycle". You will find a tutorial and also a patch that show how to do it. It is posted by user anon5189335, which is my old profile.

Wavetable - How to create1 cycle wavetable tutorial w. examples Patching
Hey guys :smile: I just flicked together this tutorial on how to create one cycle waveforms for Axoloti. You can use it instead on an oscillator and gives some new options. Anyway here goes: Pic of patch: [image] Video of the Audacity part: 0. Tutorial on how to make 1 cycle waveforms for Axoloti To start with this I would like to mention that this can de done in many ways and this is just one example, but I found it to work and the wavetables created in this way, seems to be in perâ€¦

Read full topic
item.source: Which is the best way to use one cycle waveforms as oscillators on a patch?
